Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Inene uAllâh Uyalela ukwenziwa kobulungisa nokuhle nokunikela kwizizalwana8 nezihlobo. Nokwalela ukwenziwa kokungcola nobutshinga nayo yonke ingcinezelo. Uniyalela kananjalo ukuba nithabathe ingqalelo
Ke kaloku zalisekisani iminqophiso xa nithe nanqophisa, ningazaphuli izifungo emva kokuba sele nizimisele, nibeke uAllâh ukuba Abe sisimiso senu. Inene uAllâh Uyakwazi enikwenzayo

Kananjalo ningabi nje ngomfazi okhulula umsonto asele ewolukile emveni kokuba ubusele uqinile, ngokuthabatha izifungo zenu zibe yindlela yokukhohlisa phakathi kwenu, kuba hleze uhlanga oluthile lube luninzi kakhulu kunolunye uhlanga. UAllâh Uyanivavanya kuphela ngako oku. Ukanti ngoMhla wovuko Uza kunenza nicacelwe koko naningavumelani ngako

Yaye ukuba uAllâh Ebethanda, Ebenganenza nibe luhlanga olunye (nonke) kodwa Yena Uthumela ekulahlekeni lowo Athande ukumthumela, Akhokelele lowo Athande ukumkhokelela kodwa ngokuqinisekileyo niza kubuzwa ngoko nakwenzayo

Kananjalo musani ukwenza izifungo zenu zibe yindlela yokukhohlisa phakathi kwenu, kuba unyawo lutyibilika emva kokuba besele lume ngokuqinileyo, nize nibe nokungcamla isohlwayo esibi sokuthintela (abantu) eNdleleni ka-Allâh, yaye okwenu iya kuba sisohlwayo esikhulu
Yaye futhi ningathengi inzuzwana encinane ngexabiso lomnqophiso ka-Allâh. Inene okukuAllâh kokona kulungileyo kuni ukuba benisazi
Nantoni na eninayo, iza kushokoxeka, ukanti okuka- Allâh kuya kuhlala kukhona, yaye abo banomonde, Siya kubahlawula umvuzo wabo ngokulingana nokona kuhle abakwenzayo

Nabani na owenza ubulungisa, nokuba ungoyindoda okanye ungowasetyhini olikholwa lokwenene yena Siya kumnika ubomi obulungileyo, yaye Siya kubanika (abanjalo) umvuzo wabo ngokomlinganiselo olingana nokuhle abakwenzayo
Ke kaloku xa ufuna ukucengceleza i’Kur’ân, funa ukhuseleko ngoAllâh kuShaytân owaqalekiswayo
Inene! Yena akanamandla phezu kwabo bakholwayo babeka ithemba labo eNkosini yabo (uAllâh)
Amandla akhe (uShaytân) aphezu kwabo bathobela yena bamlandele, ndawonye nabo bayamanisa amahlulelane kuYe (uAllâh)
